name: sls-packager-examples
description: A faster JavaScript packager for Serverless applications.
author: Ryan Roemer <ryan.roemer@formidable.com>

scripts.rm-bad-symlinks: find test -type l ! -exec test -e {} \; -print | xargs rm
scripts._env: echo export STAGE=${STAGE:-localdev}; echo export AWS_REGION=${AWS_REGION:-us-east-1};
scripts.install:test: yarn install:npm && yarn rm-bad-symlinks && yarn install:yarn && yarn rm-bad-symlinks
scripts.sls:package: eval $(yarn -s _env) && yarn -s _pkgs -exec sh -c 'echo Packaging: {} &&  cd {} && time sls package && du -sh .serverless/*.zip' \;
scripts.sls:package:simple: eval $(yarn -s _env) && cd test/packages/simple && time sls package && du -sh .serverless/*.zip
scripts.sls:config: eval $(yarn -s _env) && yarn -s _pkgs -exec sh -c 'echo Configuration: {} &&  cd {} && sls print' \;
